Levine" href="/author/adam-b-levine">Adam B. Levine</a></span><span class="card-date">Jun 21, 2020</span></div></div></section></div></li><li style="margin-right:48px"><div><section class="article-card "><div class="decoration"></div><div class="card-author"><a title="Articles by Omkar Godbole" href="/author/ogodbole">Omkar Godbole</a></span><span class="card-date">Jun 19, 2020</span></div></div><p class="card-text">Miner outflows of bitcoin have dropped to decade lows, with analysts saying a hoarding mentality and a drop in issuance after the halving are responsible. </p></div></section><section class="newsletter-card class="card-text">India&#x27;s crypto industry shows potential, but it continues to be held back by a lack of regulatory clarity, particularly around exchange-banking relationships. the modern world where money is abused for the benefit of the few and to the detriment of the many.</p></div></section></div><div><section class="article-card-fh xxs   pre-animation-state"><div class="card-author"><a title="Articles by Gunnar Jaerv" href="/author/gunnar-jaerv">Gunnar Jaerv</a></span><span class="card-date">Jun 22, 2020</span></div></div><p class="card-text">Gold is a traditional safe harbor in a crisis and the blockchain-based version is a good way to start taking advantage of tokenization.</p></div></section><section class="article-card-fh xxs on decentralized lender Compound has quadrupled to over $224 million in just a few days, and is by far the dominant stablecoin on the platform.</p></div></section><section class="article-card-fh xxs The underlying cryptography itself is getting an overhaul.</p></div></section></div></div></section></section></div></div><div class="story-stack-chinese-wrapper"><div class="container"><div class="page-area-dotted-content"><div class="story-stack"><section class="list-body"><div class="list-item-wrapper"><div class="list-item-card undefined"><div class="text-content"><a class="button Platform, Saying BaFin Failed to Act</h4></a><div class="card-desc-block"><span class="credit"><a title="Articles by William Foxley" href="/author/williamcoindesk-com">William Foxley</a></span><time class="time">Jun 22, 2020</time></div><a title="Germany’s Neufund Shuts Down Security Token Platform, Saying BaFin Failed to Act" href="/germanys-neufund-shuts-down-security-token-platform-saying-bafin-failed-to-act"><p class="card-text">Citing regulatory concerns, Berlin-based security token startup Neufund has announced plans to freeze its fundraising campaigns and sideline future tokenized equity offerings.</p></a></div><div class="media-content"><div class="fancy-block"></div><div class="media-wrapper"><a Industry Leader BitMEX</h4></a><div class="card-desc-block"><span class="credit"><a title="Articles by Omkar Godbole" href="/author/ogodbole">Omkar Godbole</a></span><time class="time">Jun 22, 2020</time></div><a title="Liquidity on Bitcoin Perpetuals Exchange FTX Catches Up to Industry Leader BitMEX" href="/liquidity-on-bitcoin-perpetuals-exchange-ftx-catches-up-to-industry-leader-bitmex"><p class="card-text">On a relatively new exchange like the Antigua-based FTX, the order book depth, as represented by the number of buy and sell orders at each price, now matches the depth seen on industry leader BitMEX. </p></a></div><div class="media-content"><div class="fancy-block"></div><div class="credit"><a title="Articles by Jaspreet Kalra" href="/author/jaspreet-kalra">Jaspreet Kalra</a></span><time class="time">Jun 22, 2020</time></div><a title="Crypto Trading Platform CrossTower Raises $6M in Seed Round" href="/crypto-trading-platform-crosstower-raises-6m-in-seed-round"><p class="card-text">CrossTower has raised $6 million in seed funding, with entrepreneur Gerard Lopez leading the round.</p></a></div><div class="media-content"><div class="fancy-block"></div><div class="media-wrapper"><a title="Crypto Trading Platform CrossTower Raises $6M in Seed Round"
